edu.rpi.tw.string.pmm

Class PrefixMappings

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rpi.tw.string.pmm.PrefixMappings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPrefixMappings
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BTC2010PrefixMappings, DefaultPrefixMappings, PrefixCC2010Jul23PrefixMappings, PrefixCC2011Jun10PrefixMappings

    public class PrefixMappings
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPrefixMappings
    PrefixMappings stores prefix abbreviations for namespaces.

      • PrefixMappings

        public PrefixMappings(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> prefixToNamespace)
        Populate the PrefixMappings with the given Map from abbreviations to names. NOTE: this is the opposite mapping direction than how PrefixMappings stores it.
        Parameters:
        prefixToNamespace - - map from prefix string to the full URI it represents.

        IPrefixMappings.bestNamespaceFor(String)
        Specified by:
        bestNamespaceFor in interface IPrefixMappings
        Parameters:
        uri - - e.g. http://my.name/ns#me
        Returns:
        the BEST QName for the given URI (e.g. http://my.name/ns# not http://my.name/)

      • guessNamespaceFor

        public static java.lang.String guessNamespaceFor(java.lang.String uri)
        Guess the namespace, without using any of the known prefix mappings. e.g. http://blah.org/vocab/hasName -> http://blah.org/vocab/ http://blah.org/vocab#hasName -> http://blah.org/vocab
        Parameters:
        uri -
        Returns:
        a best guess at the namespace of uri

      • bestQNameForR

        public java.lang.String bestQNameForR(org.openrdf.model.Resource resource)
        Parameters:
        resource - - e.g. http://my.name/ns#me
        Returns:
        prefix:localName OR original uri if no prefix.

      • bestQNameFor

        Returns:

      • bestLocalNameFor

        public java.lang.String bestLocalNameFor(java.lang.String uri)
        Cut off longest namespace that we know of. If we dont' recognize the namespace, cut off to # or /, whichever is last.
        Specified by:
        bestLocalNameFor in interface IPrefixMappings
        Parameters:
        uri - - e.g. http://my.name/ns#me
        Returns:
        my:me or http://my.name/ns#me if no appropriate namespace abbreviation.

      • bestLabelFor

        public java.lang.String bestLabelFor(java.lang.String uri)
        Specified by:
        bestLabelFor in interface IPrefixMappings
        Parameters:
        uri - - e.g. http://my.name/ns#my_stuff
        Returns:
        "my stuff" or http://my.name/ns#my_stuff if no appropriate namespace abbreviation.

      • bestQNameForU

        Parameters:
        uri - - e.g. http://my.name/ns#me
        Returns:
